```{r}
library(drc)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data <- read_csv("data.csv")
glimpse(data)
```




```{r warning=FALSE}
Ima <- data %>% 
  filter(AI=="imazethapyr")

model <- drm(biomred*100 ~ Rate, Cultivar, fct=W1.3(fixed =c(NA,NA,NA), names = c("slope", "upper", "ed50")), data=Ima)

#mselect(model, list(l4(), l3(), W2.3(), W1.4(), W2.4())) #model selection

plot(model, type="all", col=c(1,2), xlab="Rate of herbicide", log="", legendPos=c(3.5,50))


summary(model)
ED(model, c(10, 50, 90), type="absolute", interval ="delta") # values of y-axis
EDcomp(model, c(90,90), type="absolute")

#anova(model, model1)
```
